STRO.OL.summary: StrongPoint ASA develops and sells technology solutions for e-commerce and store operations in Norway, Sweden, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Retail Technology, Cash Security, and Labels. The company offers various retail solutions, including cash management, select and collect, click and collect, self-service, and electronic shelf labelling solutions, as well as retail management software and other solutions; and consultative services. It also provides cash security solutions for secure cash logistics. In addition, the company offers intelligent banknote neutralization system technology that protects cash in transit. Further, it sells retail solutions from third party technology providers and technology products; and manufactures and sells self-adhesive labels for various products and applications, as well as provides label design and printing services. The company has a strategic partnership with Halodi Robotics to develop an in-store grocery retail robotics solution. The company was formerly known as PSI Group ASA and changed its name to StrongPoint ASA in September 2015. StrongPoint ASA is headquartered in RÃ¦lingen, Norway.
